== Introduction ==
  This page gives general information on the device and user notes about their experience setting it up. If you need more help, please look to the WifiDocs page for more support channels.
 
== Device Info ==
** Manufacturer:
** Model #:
** Revision:
** Device Type: PCI, PCMCIA, CARDBUS, OR USB
** Chipset: FOUND WITH COMMAND <code>lspci -v | grep -A 4 Eth</code>. PASTE OUTPUT BETWEEN BRACKETS ON NEXT LINE
  {{{

  }}}
  
** Vendor/Device #: SEE BELOW TO FIND THIS INFO

----
'''DELETE THIS SECTION INCLUDING DASHES BEFORE SAVING PAGE'''

  Run this command for pci/pcmcia devices:
  {{{
  sudo lspci -v | grep -A 4 Eth
  {{{

  You will see something like this.
  {{{
  0000:03:00.0 Ethernet controller: Atheros Communications, Inc. AR5212 802.11abg NIC (rev 01)
        Subsystem: D-Link System Inc: Unknown device 3a1a
  }}}

  Then run this command:
  {{{
  lspci -n
  }}}
  Match up the fist column 
  {{{
  0000:03:00.0 0200: 168c:0013 (rev 01)
  }}}
  In this example the 168c:0013 is the vendor/device #

  Note: This will not work for USB devices. Run <code> lsusb </code> instead.

----
